content:
The crew of armored vehicles of the 3rd OSHBR mechanic-driver "Green" and the gunner "Lama" during the rest are ashamed of cameras and say that it is easier to perform the problem than to tell.

“Not those emotions now. There flew nearby, Guslya flew, and you burst - normally, there is a feeling. And to say something special - well, boyak, like a boy, ”the guys laugh.

Their main tasks are to bring the infantry to take the infantry, it happens that it is necessary to evacuate the wounded and dead. Crew together eight months. They worked on different equipment, and recently received a new Australian M113 AS4.

Photo: Elena Khudyakova / Armyinform
Photo: Elena Khudyakova / Armyinform
Photo: Elena Khudyakova / Armyinform
Photo: Elena Khudyakova / Armyinform
Photo: Elena Khudyakova / Armyinform

The car is satisfied, but emphasize that landing in different conditions must be constantly worked out, as well as communication. Because all the unpleasant moments happen because of excess rush, panic or vice versa.

“After a boy, a day or two to rest and study. We do not have this so that the infantry does not see the cars before work, " - says" green "and adds -" in the crews there can be different moments and relationships, but that one. And when you go to work, you have to think about the infantry, how to go properly, to leave, as you do not… you are people and a car. We are one in our work. "

"Liam" - a bunny of armored vehicles, works with a machine gun Browning M2 caliber 12.7.

“You can fire without getting out of the tower. From the pedal. Keep so that 10-20 release. My task is to support the machine gun in the West, to pour so that the enemy can not see what we are doing. How you will shoot where you need, not in the sky, everything will be nice. And look after. Cleanliness loves like a cat, my browning, ”says the warrior.

When asked where to work the hardest, a smile answers: everywhere. Then he adds - probably to settlements:

“From where I was - Coke. Constant 152th caliber, cabin, fpv. The cabins change the route on the move while you return, the funnels such that the car can be left. Well, that "green" baked. But it was hard. Do you know how in the aerotub, when you fall and fly, when you want to breathe first and you can't? Here something looks like. "

"Green" once studied for MTLB, so from Australian in delight. He tells - if the car does not start immediately, then there is an emergency start and gets out of it. And because it is necessary to work mainly in the dark, a stationary device of night vision (PNB - ed.) Allows you to do it safer. In the previous versions, I had to go with an open hatch with the help of nasolomny PNB. FPV has set a HPV:

“Every departure is bright. They always meet bright, quietly-it is very rare ... Although it is quiet than the old versions (M113 AS4-ed.), The car is still loud and is a goal. It is better protected, but very heavy, it should be taken into account. We try different roads. In planting - to fly calmer. They met well on Orlovka, everything was fired. There are many bonds. When we, like Evak, was taken away, we were only traveling from the point where we were hidden in 10 minutes, it was dismantled by cabin. "

In response to a question that motivates and gives strength, "green" seems to be trying to put something large -scale in short words and looks straight into the soul:

"Necessary. Just need. How many friends of my life have they put. It is necessary for n… and go from our land. ”

If the words were weight, then it would be necessary to weighed about 18 tons, as well as his "Australian".
title: The boys from the 3rd assault told about combat work and their "Australian": photo report from the Armyinform
description: “Not those emotions now. There flew nearby, Guslya flew, and you burst - normal, ...
author: Army Inform
